trans-unit.source: Indicates that a managed pointer represents a pointer parameter within a method signature.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Managed 指標會表示方法簽章內的指標參數。

trans-unit.source: In C++, managed pointers and managed references are emitted into metadata as pointers.
trans-unit.target: C + + managed 的指標和受管理的參考會發出至中繼資料與指標。

trans-unit.source: To distinguish between the two types in metadata, the Microsoft C++ compiler applies this modifier to managed pointers.
trans-unit.target: 若要區別兩種類型在中繼資料中，Microsoft c + + 編譯器適用於 managed 指標此修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: It emits no modifier on managed reference types.
trans-unit.target: 它會發出 managed 的參考型別上的任何修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: Compilers need to know the correct calling syntax when importing a method from metadata scope.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器必須知道正確的呼叫語法，從 中繼資料範圍匯入一種方法時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced> class and its partner, the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsImplicitlyDereferenced> class, disambiguate reference parameters from pointer parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced>類別和其夥伴，<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsImplicitlyDereferenced>類別，釐清從指標參數的參考參數。

trans-unit.source: Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更預設行為不適用時，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器，處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies.
trans-unit.target: 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的自訂修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。

trans-unit.source: Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器可以套用的自訂修飾詞來方法、 參數和傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers.
trans-unit.target: JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略的選擇性修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques:
trans-unit.target: 您可以發出自訂修飾詞至中繼資料，使用下列技巧：

trans-unit.source: Using methods in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class such as <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineField%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineProperty%2A>.

Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`和`modreq`，然後將組合至檔案最[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。
使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to emit an <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced> object into an assembly using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何發出<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced>使用反映的組件的物件。
